I'm the oldest, so I often feel like I need to take care of my younger siblings.
I'm having a hard time waking up in the morning, but I'm enjoying my mystery novel.
I'm doing well at school, but I miss my dad a lot.
I want to change my look to reflect my new single status.
I'm looking for a home with a large closet so I can have plenty of space for my sewing supplies.

content.text: Hi, I'm participant_1. How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks! I'm a little tired, but I'm enjoying my mystery novel. What about you?
I'm doing well, too. I'm a former park ranger, and I love reading about new music releases.
That's interesting! I've always been interested in nature, but I've never been a park ranger. What was it like?
It was great! I got to spend a lot of time outdoors and learn about different ecosystems. I also got to meet a lot of interesting people.
That sounds like a really rewarding job. What made you decide to leave?
I decided to leave to pursue my passion for music. I've always loved music, and I wanted to find a way to make it my career.
That's awesome! What kind of music do you like?
I like all kinds of music, but my favorite is probably indie rock.
I love indie rock too! What are some of your favorite bands?
I love The National, The Shins, and The xx.
Great choices! I love those bands too.
What are some of your favorite music websites?
I like Pitchfork, NME, and Stereogum.
Those are all great sites! I also like Consequence of Sound and The Quietus.
I've never heard of The Quietus, I'll have to check it out.
It's a great site! They have a lot of great reviews and articles.
Sounds good. I'm always looking for new music websites to check out.
Me too! I love finding new music
